triples.name: Fuzzy logic
triples.relevance: The paper uses fuzzy-logic systems-based approximation method to compensate for uncertainties in the system.

triples.name: State observer
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new nonlinear observer design to estimate system states in the presence of unknown nonlinear dynamics.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: The paper uses piecewise Lyapunov functional to prove stability of the system states and observation error signals.

triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: The paper employs adaptive techniques to compensate for parameter uncertainties in the nonlinear control system.

triples.name: Negative feedback
triples.relevance: The paper uses output feedback control mechanisms to stabilize the networked nonlinear system.

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes adaptive fuzzy control techniques specifically designed for networked systems with unknown nonlinear dynamics.

triples.name: Networked control system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the control problem for networked systems with communication constraints.
